scriptmanager.objects

Class GenetrackParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • scriptmanager.objects.GenetrackParameters

  • public class GenetrackParameters
extends java.lang.Object
    Object for tracking accessing GeneTrack parameters
    Author:
    William KM Lai
    See Also:
    GeneTrack_BAM, GeneTrack
